page.title: 03FARMING STRAWBERRIES
page.content: Tiptree is famous for strawberries.All through the year,the growers tend their fields to get ready for the influx of visitors in the picking season.In the 1980's "Pick Your Own" has become so popular that the County have put signs on the outskirts of Tiptree saying:PICK YOUR OWN AREA PLEASE PARK WHERE SHOWN During June & July visitors come by the coach load and strip the fields of the delicious fruit. The 1985 season was later than usual because of a cold wet spring and a wet start to the summer.This year the fruit started off at about 60 pence a pound and reduced week by week to about 30 pence a pound.
